data.name: Anthony Stolarz
data.injury: Stolarz (upper body) has yet to return to the ice, Lance Hornby of The Toronto Sun reports Thursday.

data.name: Chris Tanev
data.injury: Tanev (upper body) will be sidelined for at least another week after general manager Brad Trevling told reporters Tuesday, "Probably will know more in the next week or so," Mark Masters of TSN reports.

data.name: Marshall Rifai
data.injury: Rifai (wrist) landed on long-term injured reserve Monday, per PuckPedia.
